attributes.action: A minimum of 10 years prison sentence for convicted peadofiles.
attributes.additional_details: After seeing a prison sentence of 4 years given to a man for molestering a child, its about time british citizens made the streets of our country safer for children, 4 years doesnt compare to the rest of a life ruined of an innocent child. Lets make a change.
attributes.background: A minimum prison sentence of 10 years should be given to any peadofile under any circumstances. 1,2,3,4 years isnt enough for ruining and violating a childs life.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure which offences you want to attract a minimum sentence of ten years.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
